IDLE.HEADING: Create Your Own Stock
IDLE.DESCRIPTION: In this section, you can make your own Stock Certificate for your company.

OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH1: In the past, people used Stock Certificate as sign of his/her company ownership.
OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH2: Nowadays, It did not used anymore as sign of company ownership. But account on behalf of their stock.
OVERVIEW.PARAGRAPH3: Let's create your own Stock Certificate now! Experience the world of stocks by owning your own certificate!

COMPANY.TITLE: Create a Company
COMPANY.DESCRIPTION2: You can choose a Name, Business Sector, and Logo for your company. You can also affix a signature as a sign of Stock Certificate ownership.

PERSONAL.TITLE: Stock Information
PERSONAL.DESCRIPTION2: Enter your Name and your Stock Value.

YOUR.TITLE: Your Stock
YOUR.DESCRIPTION: Congratulations! Your creative Stock Certificate has been successfully created! Print and download to immortalize your Certificate of Stock

FINAL.EMAIL: Please enter your e-mail address. The creative Stock Certificate will be sent to your e-mail.
FINAL.QR: Please scane QR code below to download your Stock Certificate.
FINAL.PRINT: Visit our Gift Shop and redeem this following print code to get your printed Certificate`!

CONFIRMATION.TITLE: Confirmation
CONFIRMATION.DESCRIPTION2: Make sure all your data is correct.
CONFIRMATION.QUESTION: Is data correct?
CONFIRMATION.SURE: ARE YOU SURE WANT TO CONTINUE?
CONFIRMATION.EDIT: Are you sure want to edit your stock?

CLOSING.TITLE: Share Your Experience
CLOSING.PARAGRAPH1: Share and tell your friends through social media to have unforgettable experiences by having Stock Certificate!
CLOSING.PARAGRAPH2: Don't forget to follow our social media to get the latest Stock Market News in Indonesia.
